get.description: Returns market headlines for a date range.
Returns headlines for a company and a date range.
Returns market headlines published since a specific date and time.
Returns headlines for a company published since a specific date and time.
Return detailed information about a release as well as its content.
Returns headlines for a company published today.
Returns a given number of market headlines published most recently.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: The number of news items to return.

get.description: Returns a given number of company headlines published most recently.
Search market headlines across all companies based on date, source, and title.
Search headlines for a company across all companies based on date, source, and title.

url.description: URL that pertain to the bid

start_date.description: start date of the event (default sort)

source.description: Source of the trade lead, typically an organization

status.description: Status of the lead (note this API only shows open leads)
